summary: Fitness app with motivational landing page, customizable themes, AI photo transformation feature, and location tracking for walks
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero background image with fitness-themed abstract design showing movement and energy (hero-fitness.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Motivational icon representing transformation and progress (transform-icon.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create a bold landing page with the motivational message 'Make a change today and thank you for tomorrow' displayed prominently
Implement customizable color themes that allow users to switch between different color palettes throughout the app
Build an AI-powered photo transformation feature where users upload their current photo and select a duration in months of exercise/meal plans to generate and display a projected transformation image
Create a location tracking tab with an interactive map that tracks walks in real-time with start/stop controls
Calculate and display calories burned and step count for each tracked walk session
Design a cohesive visual theme with energetic, fitness-focused aesthetics using vibrant colors, modern typography, and motivational design elements that inspire action and progress

new_feature_requests.summary: Bold landing page with message 'Make a change today and thank you for tomorrow'
AI-powered photo transformation feature with exercise/meal plan selection
Location tracking tab with walk mapping, start/stop buttons, calories burned and steps display
